code: import{documentFormatter,phoneFormatter,renderDate}from'Utils/formatters';import{useCallback,useMemo}from'react';import{exportToXLS}from'Utils/functions';var useExportData=function useExportData(people){var columns=useMemo(function(){return[{name:'Nome',key:'name'},{name:'Documento',key:'document',render:function render(person){return documentFormatter(person.document);}},{name:'E-mail comercial',key:'businessEmail'},{name:'E-mail pessoal',key:'personalEmail'},{name:'Contato Comercial',key:'businessContact',render:function render(person){return phoneFormatter(person.businessContact);}},{name:'Contato Pessoal',key:'personalContact',render:function render(phone){return phoneFormatter(phone.personalContact);}},{name:'Anivers√°rio',key:'birthday',render:function render(person){return renderDate(person.birthday);}}];},[]);var exportFile=useCallback(function(){var file_name='pessoas';exportToXLS(file_name,people,columns);},[columns,people]);return exportFile;};export default useExportData;
